quote: When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity.
together: "When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity." --Albert Einstein

quote: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
together: "No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar." --Abraham Lincoln

quote: Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.
together: "Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please." --Mark Twain

quote: I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly.
together: "I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly." --Winston Churchill

quote: I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member.
together: "I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member." --Groucho Marx

quote: Why don't you get a haircut? You look like a chrysanthemum.
together: "Why don't you get a haircut? You look like a chrysanthemum." --P. G. Wodehouse

quote: Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company.
together: "Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company." --Mark Twain

quote: I can resist everything except temptation.
together: "I can resist everything except temptation." --Oscar Wilde

quote: What's another word for Thesaurus?
together: "What's another word for Thesaurus?" --Steven Wright

quote: If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.
together: "If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month." --Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Electricity is really just organized lightning.
together: "Electricity is really just organized lightning." --George Carlin

quote: I no doubt deserved my enemies, but I don't believe I deserved my friends.
together: "I no doubt deserved my enemies, but I don't believe I deserved my friends." --Walt Whitman

quote: If women ran the world we wouldn't have wars, just intense negotiations every 28 days.
together: "If women ran the world we wouldn't have wars, just intense negotiations every 28 days." --Robin Williams

quote: Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before.
together: "Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before." --Mae West

quote: It takes considerable knowledge just to realize the extent of your own ignorance.
together: "It takes considerable knowledge just to realize the extent of your own ignorance." --Thomas Sowell

quote: I love Mickey Mouse more than any woman I have ever known.
together: "I love Mickey Mouse more than any woman I have ever known." --Walt Disney

quote: One of the disadvantages of wine is that it makes a man mistake words for thoughts.
together: "One of the disadvantages of wine is that it makes a man mistake words for thoughts." --Samuel Johnson

quote: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.
together: "I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food." --W. C. Fields

quote: I haven't spoken to my wife in years. I didn't want to interrupt her.
together: "I haven't spoken to my wife in years. I didn't want to interrupt her." --Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Every time I see an adult on a bicycle, I no longer despair for the future of the human race.
together: "Every time I see an adult on a bicycle, I no longer despair for the future of the human race." --H. G. Wells

quote: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
together: "People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do." --Isaac Asimov

quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.
together: "I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific." --Lily Tomlin

quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.
together: "I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by." --Douglas Adams

quote: All right everyone, line up alphabetically according to your height.
together: "All right everyone, line up alphabetically according to your height." --Casey Stengel

quote: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
together: "Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid." --Hedy Lamarr

quote: How long was I in the army? Five foot eleven.
together: "How long was I in the army? Five foot eleven." --Spike Milligan

quote: Instant gratification takes too long.
together: "Instant gratification takes too long." --Carrie Fisher

quote: All generalizations are false, including this one.
together: "All generalizations are false, including this one." --Mark Twain

quote: The reports of my death have been greatly exaggerated.
together: "The reports of my death have been greatly exaggerated." --Mark Twain

quote: Common sense is the collection of prejudices acquired by age eighteen.
together: "Common sense is the collection of prejudices acquired by age eighteen." --Albert Einstein

quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.
together: "Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy." --Benjamin Franklin

quote: This suspense is terrible. I hope it will last.
together: "This suspense is terrible. I hope it will last." --Oscar Wilde

quote: Tact is the ability to describe others as they see themselves.
together: "Tact is the ability to describe others as they see themselves." --Abraham Lincoln

quote: If this is coffee, please bring me some tea; but if this is tea, please bring me some coffee.
together: "If this is coffee, please bring me some tea; but if this is tea, please bring me some coffee." --Abraham Lincoln

quote: If I were two-faced, would I be wearing this one?
together: "If I were two-faced, would I be wearing this one?" --Abraham Lincoln

quote: If I knew for a certainty that a man was coming to my house with the conscious design of doing me good, I should run for my life.
together: "If I knew for a certainty that a man was coming to my house with the conscious design of doing me good, I should run for my life." --Henry David Thoreau

quote: Before I refuse to take your questions, I have an opening statement.
together: "Before I refuse to take your questions, I have an opening statement." --Ronald Reagan

quote: One picture is worth 1,000 denials.
together: "One picture is worth 1,000 denials." --Ronald Reagan

quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
together: "If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance." --George Bernard Shaw

quote: A government that robs Peter to pay Paul can always depend on the support of Paul.
together: "A government that robs Peter to pay Paul can always depend on the support of Paul." --George Bernard Shaw
